creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr
text:
- META_MAPMODE is not implemented: ANISOTROPIC files have wrong scaling
- META_STRETCHDIB is not implemented: bitmaps embedded with this code are skipped
- files without APM headers can not be read

Comment on attachment 20691
batik-rendering-nothing2.wmf

files without APM, and using META_MAPMODE and META_STRETCHDIB
creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr

text:
Created attachment 20711
bug43194.patch

Patch correcting the bug. The following files are modified:
- AbstractWMFReader
- WMFHeaderProperties
- WMFPainter
- WMFRecordStore

As said before, META_MAPMODE (ANISOTROPIC mode), META_STRETCHDIB are
implemented, + files without APM are handled
creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr
